full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA MCHOG GSUM GYI THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES BLA MA MCHOG GSUM GYI THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD LDAN HO SHOS KHA THONG AE LA KO SANG MA GA TA BKRA SHIS SKYID KYI BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS AER TE NI JO BO'I KHRI PA NOM CHI CHOS RJE GRAGS PA DAR RGYAS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
